description:
It works super easy, has a nice GUI and gets its job done easily.
Everything is nice. Support for GBA files would be nice, but it could just be that I have now idea about the difference between GBC and GBA.
El emulador funciona de pta madre, el problema es que no puedo mover la ventana a otro lugar si no es en el lugar de donde inica
At the time of writing https://github.com/LIJI32/SameBoy/releases/tag/v0.16.6 is out since 1 month and the flatpak isn't updated
